title: Poster, "Air Canada - Vancouver"
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted lower right corner: red maple leaf inscribed in circle logo. Imprinted in white lower right corner: Printed in U.S.A.
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Against a green background a color photographic reproduction of a view of downtown Vancouver with the mountains rising in the background. The image bisects the poster design at an oblique angle from upper right to lower left.  Large white letters placed parallel at upper left and lower right spell 'Air Canada's' and 'Vancouver'.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Air Canada - Vancouver".
Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-277.
